name: Tomato
description: Fresh red tomatoes rich in vitamin C and perfect for salads, sauces, and soups.

name: Carrot
description: Crunchy and sweet carrots full of beta-carotene, great for snacks and stews.

name: Broccoli
description: Organic broccoli florets packed with fiber and antioxidants.

name: Cabbage
description: Crisp green cabbage ideal for stir-fries, soups, and salads.

name: Potato
description: Golden potatoes perfect for baking, mashing, or frying.

description: Glossy purple eggplants with a tender texture and rich flavor.

name: Spinach
description: Leafy green spinach full of iron, vitamins, and freshness.

name: Bell Pepper
description: Colorful bell peppers (red, yellow, and green) with a sweet crisp taste.

name: Onion
description: Aromatic onions to enhance the flavor of your everyday dishes.

name: Garlic
